pr_title: fix(badges): Fix badge syntax for older branches

timeline.bodyText: Those are no longer supported, we should be able to remove them and stop the build jobs. @meltsufin WDYT?
timeline.author: elefeint
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -7,8 +7,11 @@ Edit the files in the src/main/asciidoc/ directory instead.
 
 image:https://github.com/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp/workflows/Unit%20Tests/badge.svg?branch=master["Master (Unit Tests)", link="https://github.com/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp/actions?query=branch%3Amaster+workflow%3A"Unit+Tests""]
 image:https://github.com/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp/workflows/Integration%20Tests/badge.svg?branch=master["Master (Integration Tests)", link="https://github.com/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp/actions?query=branch%3Amaster+workflow%3A"Integration+Tests""]
-image:https://img.shields.io/travis/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp.svg?branch=1.1.x&label=1.1.x["1.1.x Build Status", link="https://travis-ci.org/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp"]
-image:https://img.shields.io/travis/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp.svg?branch=1.0.x&label=1.0.x["1.0.x Build Status", link="https://travis-ci.org/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp"]
+image:https://img.shields.io/travis/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp/master?label=master(deprecated)["master Build Status", link="https://travis-ci.org/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp/branches"]
+image:https://img.shields.io/travis/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp/1.2.x?label=1.2.x["1.2.x Build Status", link="https://travis-ci.org/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp/branches"]
+image:https://img.shields.io/travis/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp/1.1.x?label=1.1.x["1.1.x Build Status", link="https://travis-ci.org/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp/branches"]
+image:https://img.shields.io/travis/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp/1.0.x?label=1.0.x["1.0.x Build Status", link="https://travis-ci.org/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp/branches"]

replies.bodyText: I believe 1.1.x is still supported till the end of the year, but yeah, I agree, we can probably remove both of them.
replies.author: meltsufin

timeline.message: fix(badges): Fix badge syntax for older branches
